You subdue the furious souls, ripping them into motes of their constituent essence.

Beyond this cloud of essence you feel the pull of the cycle, a force that steadily increases. This pillar remains steadfastly blocked from the natural flow.
[Return the natural flow of essence to the adra, restoring its luminosity.]

You push the essence through the widening channel to the Beyond. They churn and spin away. Suddenly the ether around you develops into a churning maelstrom.

You pull yourself back toward your body before the force rips your soul away.

You animate the corrupted essence into a destructive force, ripping the space around you apart.

You escape back toward your body before you are destroyed, too.

Power still hums through the essence. Sending it through the cycle would restore the adra around you.

Fragmenting it would detonate the delicate balance of power, destroying the pillar.

Either way, the steady tug of the Beyond grows. You must decide quickly.
